item.title: About Me
item.description: A student a the Technische Universität München studying informatiks(computer science). Meanwhile i am also a working student a Check24. Experience # Scholarship 2023-24 Check24 Codeclub Gained insights into enterprise software development through participation in monthly tech talks and workshops Received mentorship to support the completion of individual technical projects Software Development Intern 2023 Check24 Finanzen GmbH Gained hands on experience in software engineering, applying knowledge learned in scholarship, including agile methodologies such as scrum Contributed to establishing the frontend foundations for new functionalities on a high load application Software Development Working Student AWESOME Check24 Finanzen GmbH Gained hands on experience in software engineering, applying knowledge learned in scholarship, including agile methodologies such as scrum Contributed to establishing the frontend foundations for new functionalities on a high load application

item.description: Details about this project, challenges faced, solutions implemented, etc.

item.title: A short rant about the spotify apis
item.description: Using the spotify api can be a lot of fun, especially since you can get so much information on a user and can basically control his account from the api. This allows for crazy ideas to be implemented. But not everything is sunshine and roses when working with the api! Untuchable with a large userbase #
